use.flag: Checks the android dependencies to build Android executibles and installs android examples.

Automatically installs per user without mounting. Recommended for easy updates per user. The per package environmental variable QB64_USERS should look like QB64_USERS="person1:/home/person1;person2:/home/person files". ${HOME}/.bin must be unencrypted. Plausible deniability compromised if drive is not fully encrypted.
Installs a copy per-user via emerge --config. Recommended for mounted or encrypted home directories. It is required that the user login to mount their home directory.
Installs and configures the program for systemwide use. Not recommended.
